serviceArea: Los Angeles metropolitan area - 7 gym locations
shortDescription: Iconic workout experience with nightclub vibes, featuring sauna, steam room, jacuzzi, pool, and basketball courts across 7 Los Angeles locations.
longDescription: Speakeasy Fitness gives you an iconic workout experience in Los Angeles. The gym boasts amenities such as sauna, steam room, jacuzzi, warm water pool, and basketball courts. With EDM music and nightclub vibes, Speakeasy offers an electrifying atmosphere for your workout. Affordable price points starting as low as $20.99 monthly with month-to-month options available. Features include the iconic Butt Zone, turf area, Hammer Strength equipment, cardio zones, multiple dumbbell areas, and boxing facilities.

businessHours.note: Hours shown for Sylmar location - hours vary by location
